name: Gaia's Renewal
description:
Gaia, the Goddess of the Earth, must restore the decaying nature that Kronos, the God of Time, is trying to spread. 

Score points by overturning the decay with your magic. Have a higher score than Kronos at the end of the round to win and save the Earth!

CONTROLS 

Shoot = LMB (Left Mouse Button)

Aim = Mouse

Move = WASD or Arrows

CREDITS
